Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial project structure - Chatbot Commercial IPTV

- Configuration Node.js + TypeScript
- Docker Compose pour PostgreSQL et Redis
- Structure des dossiers \(api, services, database, utils\)
- Fichiers de configuration \(config/, utils/\)
- Point d''entree Express avec webhooks placeholders
- Migration SQL initiale \(leads, conversations, messages\)
- Documentation \(README.md, SETUP.md\)
- GitHub Actions CI workflow

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
